title: References (Part 11)
content:
References

References (Part 11)

Continued References [145-157]

  • [145] Chunlok Lo et al. - Goal-space planning with subgoal models (2024)
  • [146] Ao Li et al. - Agent-oriented planning in multi-agent systems (2024)
  • [147] Mianchu Wang et al. - Goplan: Goal-conditioned offline reinforcement learning by planning with learned models (2023)
  • [148] Chenglong Kang et al. - Retrointext: A multimodal large language model enhanced framework for retrosynthetic planning via in-context representation learning (2025)
  • [149] Jiacheng Ye et al. - Beyond autoregression: Discrete diffusion for complex reasoning and planning (2024)
  • [150] Yupeng Zheng et al. - Planagent: A multi-modal large language agent for closed-loop vehicle motion planning (2024)
  • [151] Sid Nayak et al. - Long-horizon planning for multi-agent robots in partially observable environments (2024)
  • [152] Tianxin Wei et al. - Latte: Collaborative test-time adaptation of vision-language models in federated learning (2025)
  • [153] Wenzuun Bao et al. - WAPITI: A watermark for finetuned open-source LLMs (2024)
  • [154] Zhining Liu et al. - Breaking silos: Adaptive model fusion unlocks better time series forecasting (2025)
  • [155] Lihui Liu et al. - Logic query of thoughts: Guiding large language models to answer complex logic queries with knowledge graphs (2024)
  • [156] Zhining Liu et al. - Class-imbalanced graph learning without class rebalancing (2024)
  • [157] Zhining Liu et al. - Class-imbalanced graph learning without class rebalancing (2024)

Analysis & Explanation

Multi-Agent and Specialized Planning

Research Directions
  • Goal-Conditioned: Subgoal models, goal planning
  • Multi-Agent: Coordinated robot planning
  • Domain-Specific: Chemistry, vehicle motion
